current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit
			 RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach
			 Unit RI–07 in the State of Rhode Island.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

header.#text:
Replacement of John H. Chafee
			 Coastal Barrier Resources System map

quote.#text:
Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit
			 RI–06, Hazards Beach Unit RI–07

John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources
			 System

text.#text:
is included in
			 the set of maps entitled

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: as the set of maps entitled

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources
			 Act

text.#text:
relates to
			 certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in the State
			 of
			 Rhode Island.

quote.#text:
John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier
			 Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P,

text.#text:
